sqlGroup.sql: SELECT t.id, t.b_id, 5 AS type, CONCAT( oil_brand.`name`, '|', oil_model.`name`, ' ', oil_etalon.`name`, ' ', IF (litre = 1, 1, 4), 'L ', IF ( t.type = 1, '（全合成）', IF ( t.type = 2, '（半合成）', '（矿物油）' ) ) ) AS `name`, litre, price, p_id FROM ( SELECT id, e_id, type, b_id, m_id, price, litre FROM oil_price WHERE e_id = ? AND type = ? AND `status` = 0 AND recmd = 0 ) t LEFT JOIN oil_brand ON t.b_id = oil_brand.id AND oil_brand.`status` = 0 LEFT JOIN oil_model ON t.m_id = oil_model.id AND oil_model.`status` = 0 LEFT JOIN oil_etalon ON t.e_id = oil_etalon.id AND oil_etalon.`status` = 0 LEFT JOIN oil_pic ON t.e_id = oil_pic.e_id AND t.type = oil_pic.type

SELECT new_oil.id, new_oil.litre, CONCAT( oil_brand.`name`, '|', oil_model.`name`, ' ', oil_etalon.`name`, ' ',
IF (new_oil.litre = 1, 1, 4), 'L ',
IF ( new_oil.type = 1, '（全合成）',
IF ( new_oil.type = 2, '（半合成）', '（矿物油）' ) ) ) AS `name`, p_id, new_oil.price FROM ( SELECT b_id, m_id, type, e_id, litre FROM oil_price WHERE id = ? ) AS origin_oil LEFT JOIN oil_price AS new_oil ON origin_oil.e_id = new_oil.e_id AND origin_oil.type = new_oil.type AND origin_oil.litre = new_oil.litre AND new_oil.b_id = ? LEFT JOIN oil_brand ON new_oil.b_id = oil_brand.id AND oil_brand.`status` = 0 LEFT JOIN oil_model ON new_oil.m_id = oil_model.id AND oil_model.`status` = 0 LEFT JOIN oil_etalon ON new_oil.e_id = oil_etalon.id AND oil_etalon.`status` = 0 LEFT JOIN oil_pic ON new_oil.e_id = oil_pic.e_id AND new_oil.type = oil_pic.type WHERE new_oil.id IS NOT NULL;
